subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
Freestyle Skiing
Olympic Games
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Recent additions to the Olympic sports roster require judges to determine the winners, not clocks or measuring tape — an exercise that might seem ripe for exploitation and debate.
